InfluenceRule.name: Irritable people are more likely to be bothered by others
Mean people insult friends
Inarticulate people are unlikely to use words to create conflict
Domineering people try to affect other peoples choices in friends and make judgements on them
Pacifists don't like to be aggressive
Ripped people are less likely to use direct hate through words and more through bullying
Weaklings are more likely to use words to cause conflict
Emotional people are volitile with emotions and what they say
Jealous people bash others due to jealousy
Witty people love using language and wit to talk shit
Oblivious people are impreceptive and are less likely to insult the features of others
Vengeful people are more likely to talk shit
Clumsy people don't usually use insult friends something that requires tact
Dumb people aren't good at insulting friends
People are more likely to insult the friends of someone who is cool as opposed to bullying them
Bullies are more likely to be mean to others
People who are looking for trouble are more likely to instigate social conflict
Insulting the friends of others is a way to pick on them
People are more likely to insult those they envy
People are more likely to insult those who have cheated on them
People are more likely to talk shit about people they are annoyed with
Insecure people insult those who feel they are better than them behind their backs
i insults o when i thinks he is better than o and that r is cooler than o
Impulsive people get angry
Irritable people respond to conflict
Loyal people don't like others hatin' on their friends
Sympathetic people understand other's concerns
Insecure people let others get away with murder
People who are afraid of commitment don't choose sides
People who are domineering don't like others having strong opinions about their own relationships
Defensive people are defensive
Hotheads react negatively to negative movements
Pacifists avoid conflict
Emotional are defensive over friends
Oblivious people don't consider that friends are being insulted
Vengeful people don't like it when people hate on their friends
Popular people don't care if people who aren't close friends get railed on
People who feel superior don't like hearing other peoples opinions
People who trust others opinions are more likely to agree with their insults
When r romances for i more than o, then r is more willing to hear i's problems
When r romances for i more than o, then r is more willing to hear i's problems
When r romances for i more than o, then r is more willing to hear i's problems
When r romances for i more than o, then r is more willing to hear i's problems

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% totally turned %ip% insult into like a compliment
%i% insulted %rp% friends
%i% made fun of %o% to %r% even though %list(o,r,we/they)% were friends
%i% vented about %o% to the wrong person
%i% vented about %o% to the wrong person
%list(i,r,and)% kind of bonded over %op% embarrassing video
%i% tried without success to get a rise out of %r%
%i% insulted %rp% friend for liking %CKB_((i,dislikes),(o,likes),(lame))%s
%r% agreed with %i% that %op% obsession with %CKB_((i,dislikes),(o,likes),())%s gets annoying
%r% stuck up for %o% because %list(r,o,we/they)%'re friends, even though %is% thought %o% %pron(o,was/were)% unpopular
%o% showed up during %ip% insults and stuck up for %pron(o,him/her)%self
%r% threw %o% under the bus when %is% insulted %pron(o,him/her)%
%i% couldn't handle %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)% hanging out with %o% and called off the relationship
%i% got on %rp% bad side by insulting %o%, %pron(r,his/her)% friend
%i% insulted %o%, %rp% friend
%i% made a lame attempt to insult %o%, %rp% friend
%i% trash-talked %rp% friends
%i% insulted %rp% popular friend, %o%
%i% insulted %rp% unpopular friend, %o%
%r% taught %i% a lesson about your mom jokes
%i% couldn't even insult %rp% mom without being a geek
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% too busy texting to get offended by %ip% insult

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. Were those your friends hanging out %random(on the steps,by the cafeteria,by the dumpsters,by the flagpole,in the parking lot)% earlier?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, why?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %random(I thought maybe there was an explosion at the poser factory,I didn't know the circus was in town,I thought zoo security had been beefed up,I thought maybe they were filming a new movie. About stupid people,I thought maybe an invasion of really ugly zombies was going on,I thought maybe someone was doing a remake of The House on Loser Hill,I thought maybe someone was making a documentary about fat people,I thought maybe someone was filming a remake of The Thing)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is that supposed to be funny?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Is your face?,Yes.,Obviously.,No duh.)%
Hey, %r%, guess what. I bumped into one of your friends earlier.
%gender(r,He,She)% was so fat I bounced all the way back down the hall.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's true, my friends are pretty phat. And yeah, knowing their music I bet the whole hall was bouncing!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...I see what you did there.
Hey %r%, I saw your friend %o% do something totally lame. %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Why don't you leave my friends alone, %pejorative%?
Leave %o% alone! Just leave %pron(o,him/her)% alone!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why don't you make me, %pejorative%.
%greeting%. You'll never believe what %o% did to me. %toc1%. Isn't that totally rude?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %op% my friend and I don't like people trash talking %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well excuse me. It happened, alright? Maybe you should rethink who your friends are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Trust me, %i%, I'm doing just that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. omg, you'll never believe what %o% did to me. %toc1%. Isn't that totally nuts?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: For your information, %pejorative%, %o% is my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend and I don't like people trash talking %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe you shouldn't be dating such a %pejorative%, chalk-for-brains.
Oh, hello %r%. Have you seen that hilarious video of %o%'s %random(eighth birthday,junior high prom date,Justin Bieber impression)% going around the web?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% is my friend and I don't appreciate you poking fun at %pron(o,him/her)%.
....but the video is kind of hilarious.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hehe, yeah.
Hey %r%. I saw your lame friend %o% %random(in the hall,by the pool,at the mall,in the parking lot,at the sunglass hut)% the other day. %pron(o,he/she)% looked like a total %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well, that's just like, your opinion, man.
%o% and I are friends, but I don't really have any beef with you.%if(0, I'm kind of a pacifist really.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh. Ok. Whatever.
%greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Is it true that your friend %o% likes %toc1%s?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, what about it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's *so* lame. How can you put up with someone like that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, lay off %o%. %gender(o,He,She)%'s my friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever, I guess you must be just as lame for being friends with %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Just get out of my face.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting% %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Is it true that your friend %o% likes %toc1%s?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, it's pretty lame. One of %pron(o,his/her)% many flaws.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How do you put up with that?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't stand it sometimes. %gender(o,He,She)% just goes on and on about %toc1%s.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, I can't stand that either.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I'm glad we agree on something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, we have a popularity crisis!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What is it, %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: It's about your friend %o%. %gender(o,He,She)%'s... how can I put this...
...so not popular.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What about it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What *about* it? Wake up, %gender(r,mister,honey)%, you're consorting with the outcrowd!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %o% is my friend, and nothing is going to change about that!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I don't believe this. Enjoy your popularity while you can, because at this rate it won't last long.
I can't believe how lame %o% is!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(o,He,She)%'s just *so* not cool. My grandma is cooler then %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Hey guys, what's going on over here?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i% just said that %pron(i,his/her)% grandma is cooler then you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh, yeah. I didn't think you would be right there...

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: You shouldn't be talking, %gender(i,Mister, Miss)% 'everyone thinks I'm uncool so I'm going to dump on someone else.'

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oooh, burn!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Can you believe how lame %o% is?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I know, try being friends with %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, like, my grandma is cooler than %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %i% was just telling me that %pron(i,his/her)% grandma is cooler than you.
I would have to agree.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Well I didn't want to be friends with you anyway!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What a loser.

Instantiation.name: InsultFriendOf - R and O are friends, I and O are enemies, I and R are dating

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%, what's up with your friend %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What do you mean?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(o,He,She)% is just so lame, I don't know how you can stand being around %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, just because you are my %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)% doesn't mean you can insult my friends like that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Are you really choosing %pron(o,his/her)% side on this? Over your own %gender(i,boyfriend,girlfriend)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm just hoping you two can just stop your silly bickering and just make up. For my sake.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't believe you! If %pron(o,he/she)% means that much to you, why don't you just go out with %pron(o,him/her)% then!
Save it, we are through.
Hey %r%, did you know you're friends with the biggest %pejorative% in school?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell are you talking about?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %o%. What a loser. %gender(o,He,She)%'s so lame, I don't know how you can stand being around %pron(o,him/her)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What gives you the right to insult my friends, %pejorative%?
This conversation is OVER.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%. %random(Say,So,So like,Hey)%, %random(I was talking to,I bumped into,I ran into,I was chatting with,I was sitting next to,I had to sit next do,I was stuck in line next to)% your buddy %o% %random(earlier,earlier today,just now,a while ago,this morning,at lunch)%. %random(Man,Wow,Geez,Holy cow)%, what a %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Don't you talk about my friends that way,Leave my friends alone,Leave my friends out of this,Quit it,You say another word about my friends and I'll kill you,Don't go there,Stop trash talking my friends)%, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %random(I'm sorry,my apologies,my bad,I didn't realize,my mistake)%, %r%. %random(I thought you knew,I assumed you were aware of,I figured you must be used to,I thought it was obvious)% how %random(stupid,fat,obese,boring,trite,idiotic,butt-ugly,stuck-up,smelly,gut-churningly disgusting,unfashionabe,grody,mind-numbingly lame-brained,lame)% %pron(o,he/she)% %random(is,can be,usually is,tragically is)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(That's it,All right,Okay,Fine,That's enough,You've said enough)%, %pejorative%. Now %random(get lost,get out of here,get out of my face,beat it,take a hike,take a walk,start walking,get out of my sight)% before I %random(beat your face in,punch your lights out,scratch your eyes out,report you as a bully to the vice principal,get angry,do something I'll regret,put you in the hospital,put a hole in that pretty smile of yours,make you wish you'd never been born)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%. You know your friend %o%? %gender(o,He,She)%'s %random(fat. Fatty fat fat,ugly. Ugly McUglerson,Dumb. Dumby dumb dumb,a tool. Tooly McCorporate Sellout,smelly. Smelly McGarbage Odorson,lame. Lamey lame lame)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's that, %i%? %random(I had my headphones in.,My stupidity filter edited out anything you were saying just now.,I decided this morning only to hear nice things today.,I thought you might have been saying something rude about my friends but I *know* you're too sweet a person to do something as juvenile as that,I don't usually listen to what you say because most of it is so boring,I sort of tuned out because your voice is so terribly droney,That garbage truck driving by sort of drowned out whatever boring crap it was you were saying)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhh.... %random(nothing,it was nothing,never mind,forget it,that's okay,I'll go over here now)%.

Hey, %r%. I just passed by some %random(mouth breathers,human garbage,sad-looking rejects,hopeless losers,pathetic slobs,foul-smelling whales)% who say they're friends of yours. %random(Isn't that sad?,What a bunch of jokes.,It kind of made me want to throw up.,You don't seriously *like* those failures do you?,Glad you've found a fitting crew to run with.,They're almost as sad as you are.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(You take that back or I'll take it back for you,You bad mouth my friends again and I'll kick your ass,You keep trash talking my friends and I'll make you wish you'd never been born,Shut up or I'll make you)%, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'd like to see you try.
Oh look, it's %r%! %op% little press secretary.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about, %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, well it's just that %pron(o,he/she)%'s *so* popular, I assume you must be handling all %pron(o,his/her)% publicity these days.
Does %pron(o,he/she)% pay you well to pretend to be %pron(o,his/her)% friend, %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's it. I'm sick of you bad-mouthing %o% all the time. Just because %pron(o,he/she)%'s popular doesn't change our friendship.
But it definitely changes what I think of *you*.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Fine. Enjoy hanging out with your precious %o%, %r%. While %pron(o,he/she)% still remembers you exist.
Oh hey, %r%. I just got a text from your pathetic friend %o%. God, what a loser. How can you stand %pron(o,him/her)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's *it*, %i%! I'm sick and tired of you bad mouthing my friends all the time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What, you're not seriously going to *defend* that %pejorative%, are you?
%gender(o,He,She)%'s nobody, %r%. Bottom of the food chain. A waste of space.
But I guess losery loves company, eh?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I've had it with your garbage, %i%. Shut up and go away.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: With pleasure.

Hey %r%. Your mom's so %random(fat she has her own zip code,lame she thinks Nickelback is a refund,fat she takes her chin as a carry-on,dumb she got hit by a parked car,dumb she waited all day at a stop sign,fat she has her own zip code,old she thinks the internet is a series of tubes)%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: My mother's dead.
Not really. But I think you've learned a valuable lesson about juvenile humor today, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. Your mom's so %random(fat that the coefficient of friction between herself and the environment is greater than her kinetic friction,ugly that Pythagoras wouldn't touch her with a 3-4-5 triangle,stupid that she tried to minimize a 12-variable function to a minimal sum of products expression using a karnaugh map instead of the Quine-McCluskey Algorithm)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't even know what that means.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%. I saw some of your lame friends the other day. They were being totally lame. And stupid.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't really have time for this, %i%. I'm kind of in the middle of something.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Aren't you upset that I'm bad-mouthing your friends?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't really pay attention to anything you say, so no, not really.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You... I... grrrrrrr.
